directions.step:
From: "steven.h.bergstein" <steven.h.bergstein@ac.com>
Date: 19 Jul 96 11:11:22 Recipe By: Better Homes & Gardens, July 1996
In a small sacuepan, combine all ingredients. Bring just to a boil.
Brush sauce on burgers during last ten minutes of cooking. Heat remaining sauce just until bubbly and serve on the side.
Makes 1 1/2 - 2 cups, enough for 1-2 lbs of meat.
bbq-digest V2 #035
From the BBQ recipe list. Downloaded from Glen's MM Recipe Archive, http://www.erols.com/hosey.
